name: Photography Glossary
author: Ben Hall

sections.description:
The Free Photo Glossary is an easy to use WordPress Plugin that will load a random photography term and display it’s definition. It’s a great sidebar addition to provide fresh content for photography based websites and blogs.

The plugin includes a sidebar widget so that you can place the glossary easily into your sidebar and wordpress theme.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the contents of photography-glossary.zip
  2. Upload the full photography-glossary folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Using the Widgets admin panel add the Photo Glossary widget in your templates. Add an optional title if desired.
sections.faq:
How much does this plugin cost?

The plugin is 100% free. Knock yourself out.

How can I get help?

Visit http://www.dimbal.com for any and all support inquiries.
